website_summaries.verdict: Popular highlighter from MAC that is ideal for showcasing cheekbones and angles on the face
pros: Seamlessly melts into other makeup that you are wearing without affecting your look
A good highlighter to use if you like to try out the latest beauty trends such as strobing and strong highlighting
cons: Can be complicated to use for those who aren't aware of various techniques

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hyperpigmentation and dark circles
customer_reviews.text: I use this primer as a corrector..i have some hyperpigmentation and undereyw circles. I have tried four different peach correctors from drugstore and the high end brands. But nothing worked. This prodcut changed my makeup game. Its so good that i dont have to use concealer. And i use very little foundation. I use this primer first and blend it with small flat foundation brush. After that i apply foundation and wallaaahhh.. i am good to go.. my skin looks flowless.. l
customer_reviews.author: Dhruti

customer_reviews.title: Light and blends well.
customer_reviews.text: I've never used make up before and I'm glad I started with this. Eventhough it's a peach color, it blends beautifully into my brown skin and lightens up the dark circles under my eyes. It has a very light feel. I don't feel it on my skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: LaRyssa Martin

customer_reviews.title: One of the most wonderful things I discovered
customer_reviews.text: Hides my pigmentation. One of the most wonderful things I discovered. I think it's cheaper at the Mac store.
customer_reviews.author: Shazoo

customer_reviews.title: Conceals under eye dark circles
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my undereye dark circles. It's better than anything I've ever used. It has actually concealed and have brighten up my under eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Prunty

customer_reviews.title: Item purchased from amazon is not authentic
customer_reviews.text: This product is great however this particular item I purchased from amazon is poor quality. Feels and looks like item was diluted with water . Would not purchase from this seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Literally the only product that works as a colour correcter on my skin. Makes all the difference in every other product i use with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: I love it and I am going to buy itagain
customer_reviews.author: mariam89

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just received an empty box with no product!! Sticker on bag said damage out missing product!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer smith

customer_reviews.title: it's great!! U can wear it with or without ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes..it's great!! U can wear it with or without Foundation. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Dont believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I heard all the rave about this MAC product so thought that I would give it a try. To tell you the truth La Girl Pro concealer works soo...much better for covering my dark circles. $40.00 compared to $1.99 I should have saved my money. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy J

customer_reviews.title: Great for dark undereyes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the bomb.com. Love this for dark under eye circles.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. :) Im a guy and it works great. College atudent has to look good too. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Sinsuni

customer_reviews.title: Great Product why the high price?
customer_reviews.text: Great product and blends beautifully. Not sure why they are selling for over $40 when it $26 at the Mac counter.
customer_reviews.author: April Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: It delivers!
customer_reviews.text: My skin loves this product. It povide just enough coverage and blends beautifully! It’s the perfect backdrop for all other foundations. When well-blended, I can wear this alone.
customer_reviews.author: Tina P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I will get this one over and over again thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: DivaStyleHairNnails

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: The content is 3.6 ml or 0.12 Fl OZ. Enough said. Absolutely rediculous.
customer_reviews.author: M
